fields.customfield_12310192: HIVE-11051: Hive 1.2.0 MapJoin w/Tez - LazyBinaryArray cannot be cast to [Ljava.lang.Object; (Matt McCline via Gopal V)

fields.summary: Caused by: java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.lazybinary.LazyBinaryStruct cannot be cast to [Ljava.lang.Object;

fields.description:
I tried to apply: HIVE-10729 which did not solve the issue.

The following exception is thrown on a Tez MapJoin with Hive 1.2.0 and Tez 0.5.4/0.5.3

To Recreate the issue:

{code}
import table service_request_clean from  '/user/user/service_request_clean';

import table ct_events_clean from  '/user/user/ct_events_clean';


drop table ct_events1_test;
create table ct_events1_test
as select  a.*,
b.svcrqst_id,
b.svcrqct_cds,
b.svcrtyp_cd,
b.cmpltyp_cd,
b.sum_reason_cd as src,
b.cnctmd_cd,
b.notes
from ct_events_clean a
inner join
service_request_clean b
on a.contact_event_id = b.cnctevn_id;

{code}
fields.summary: Hive 1.2.0  MapJoin w/Tez - LazyBinaryArray cannot be cast to [Ljava.lang.Object;

comments.body: Here are the tables and metadata to import for the re-create

By setting the following Hive option the query will complete with no exceptions...

set hive.mapjoin.optimized.hashtable=false;


set hive.mapjoin.optimized.hashtable=false;
hive> drop table ct_events1_test;
create table ct_events1_test
drop table ct_events1_test;
as select  a.*,
b.svcrqst_id,
b.svcrqct_cds,
b.svcrtyp_cd,
b.cmpltyp_cd,
b.sum_reason_cd as src,
b.cnctmd_cd,
b.notes
from hue_debug.ct_events_clean a
inner join
service_request_clean b
on a.contact_event_id = b.cnctevn_id;OK
Time taken: 0.66 seconds
hive> create table ct_events1_test
    > as select  a.*,
    > b.svcrqst_id,
    > b.svcrqct_cds,
    > b.svcrtyp_cd,
    > b.cmpltyp_cd,
    > b.sum_reason_cd as src,
    > b.cnctmd_cd,
    > b.notes
    > from hue_debug.ct_events_clean a
    > inner join
    > service_request_clean b
    > 
on a.contact_event_id = b.cnctevn_id;

This seems to be related/similar:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/28606244/issues-upgrading-to-hdinsight-3-2-hive-0-14-0-tez-0-5-2

http://qnalist.com/questions/5904003/map-side-join-fails-when-a-serialized-table-contains-arrays

Took the patch #3 I created for HIVE-10729 and fixed a bug in it and added the test case attached to this JIRA since it repros a problem (but converted the problematic imports into simple loads).  At the moment I can't tell if it is the same problem as HIVE-10729, but likely it is.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12741454/HIVE-11051.01.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12741454 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
Failures appear to be unrelated.
Fix looks good. Tested in our environment testing one final use case today.
[~t3rmin4t0r] do you want to take a look?
(Ooops add comment to wrong JIRA)
[~wzheng] Can you give this a non-binding +1?  Thanks

[~mmccline] +1. The patch looks good.

Some trivial comments:
1. There are two imports that are not used in HybridHashTableContainer so can be removed.
2. fixupComplexObjects may have a better name like getComplexFieldsAsList, to be consistent to getFieldsAsList. It's your call.
3. There's one line exceeding 80 chars in unpack method for the two container classes.
4. This comment may be no longer needed (it's been there for a while) // TODO: should we unset bytes after that?
[~wzheng] [~gopalv] Thank you for your review.  Patch #2 has changes for review.
[~mmccline]: LGTM - +1.
Also needs a back-port to branch-1, once the pre-commit tests pass on trunk.

Commits 5351c35bffa251ba17de22bcd5ef0b9b06d134c9 & 2a77e87e347d368a806c53df5f5ac709339a47bc.
this is a blocker bug for us, can this patch be made available for hive 1.2 as well...
